## FileDropzoneProps interface

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface FileDropzoneProps 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { FileDropzoneProps } from '@grafana/ui';
```
<b>Properties</b>

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [children](#children-property) | <code>ReactNode</code> | Use the children property to have custom dropzone view. |
|  [fileListRenderer](#filelistrenderer-property) | <code>(file: DropzoneFile, removeFile: (file: DropzoneFile) =&gt; void) =&gt; ReactNode</code> | The fileListRenderer property can be used to overwrite the list of files. To not to show any list return null in the function. |
|  [onLoad](#onload-property) | <code>(result: string &#124; ArrayBuffer &#124; null) =&gt; void</code> | Use the onLoad function to get the result from FileReader. |
|  [options](#options-property) | <code>DropzoneOptions</code> | Use this property to override the default behaviour for the react-dropzone options.  { maxSize: Infinity, minSize: 0, multiple: true, useFsAccessApi: false, maxFiles: 0, } |
|  [readAs](#readas-property) | <code>'readAsArrayBuffer' &#124; 'readAsText' &#124; 'readAsBinaryString' &#124; 'readAsDataURL'</code> | Use this to change the FileReader's read. |

### children property

Use the children property to have custom dropzone view.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
children?: ReactNode;
```

### fileListRenderer property

The fileListRenderer property can be used to overwrite the list of files. To not to show any list return null in the function.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
fileListRenderer?: (file: DropzoneFile, removeFile: (file: DropzoneFile) => void) => ReactNode;
```

### onLoad property

Use the onLoad function to get the result from FileReader.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
onLoad?: (result: string | ArrayBuffer | null) => void;
```

### options property

Use this property to override the default behaviour for the react-dropzone options.  { maxSize: Infinity, minSize: 0, multiple: true, useFsAccessApi: false, maxFiles: 0, }

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
options?: DropzoneOptions;
```

### readAs property

Use this to change the FileReader's read.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
readAs?: 'readAsArrayBuffer' | 'readAsText' | 'readAsBinaryString' | 'readAsDataURL';
```
